  • Field Details

    • statics

      protected final PotionType statics

  • Constructor Details

    • Potion

      public Potion(String name, String description)
      Constructor for creating a new Potion with default type. Initializes the potion with the given name and description, and sets its type to NORMAL by default.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the potion
      description - A description of what the potion does

    • Potion

      public Potion(String name, String description, PotionType newStatic)
      Constructor for creating a new Potion with a specific type. Initializes the potion with the given name, description, and potion type.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the potion
      description - A description of what the potion does
      newStatic - The type of the potion, which determines its effectiveness

  • Method Details

    • getPotionType

      public PotionType getPotionType()
      Gets the type of this potion. The potion type determines the magnitude of its effect when used.
      Returns:
      The PotionType enum value representing this potion's type
